<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Generate a payment slip for specific account"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/payment/payment-slip/account/{accountId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This method is called when sending single instances of payment slip to be processed by our infrastructure.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"accountId","description":"The Account Id (Uuid) of Beneficiary. For example: {54c4ed21-5f1f-4942-a3f8-b96537566cb5}","schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>
